resources.string: You must make a move before ending your turn!
That column is full! You cannot place a disk there.

Two players alternate turns dropping one of their discs at a time into an unfilled column until a player achieves four discs in a row diagonally, horizontally, or vertically and wins.
If the game board fills before either player achieves four in a row, then the game is a draw.
You may only place 1 tile per turn, and then you must hit the "Done" button. 
If you have connected 4 in a row, after hitting "Done" it will take you to the winner screen.
You can "Give Up" through the "Surrender" button at any time.
Player 1 is the dark green Sparty tile and Player 2 is the white Sparty tile.
